description: Demolition of rear outbuilding and replacement with new outbuilding at lower ground floor level; creation of rear terrace at ground floor level over new outbuilding with new access created in rear of closet wing, and walk-on glazing covering over the existing light well; extending and lowering of front vault area to create additional internal accommodation including new window facing into the front light well area. Alterations to the front light well area: creation of access door underneath ground floor entrance steps; creation of access steps to front light well area; insertion of window to front facade of lower ground floor. Re-landscaping of new front garden area with new front boundary wall and side boundary fences, and formation of bin and bicycle storage area; insertion of windows to the front and rear elevations of the existing property at lower levels; and internal modifications***WITHDRAWN***
